nelson.o.n: When will women ever be equal to men when they were not created with the same ability? I don't know why we human sometimes embark on a dividing course. Feminism is an attempt to further destroy the relationship between man and woman; an attempt to make two captain steer the same ship; an attempt to instate two presidents in a country at the same time. This tenacity about feminism, racism and Eastern marginalization of the Igbos make me sick sometimes. Well that is what is making you famous. Devoting one's entire life on these issues do not change anything. Think of how much you have been able to change since you started. The only thing you achieved is sympathy and fame for dwelling on a sentimental themes. Of course the shallow and uninformed mind yield to sentiments a lot of time. We should just all be human beings, men or women, black or white northerner, westerner or easterner, what matter more is our abilities. Imagine the impact you've made with your writing ability, not the theme of your writing but your creative ability. That is what make one person equal to the other or more than the other these days and not sex or race or origin. Humans are just not created equal, Pleaseeeee!
